document_data.name: Halric Bonesnapper
document_data.mainbody: '''Halric Bonesnapper''' was the ruler of [[Griffon's Nest]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Relationship: Halric was the grandson of the great [[Kralgar Bonesnapper]]
document_data.Activities: Halric lived in comfort in his longhouse where he met other chieftains. He sometimes launched bold raids in fear that other chieftains believed his tribe had lost the favor of [[Uthgar]].
document_data.Personality: Halric once dreamed of wiping out all the cities of the [[North]] but his tribe was too small. He lived in fear that he had truly lost Uthgar's favor.
